genre_description: A temporal thriller involving aviation disaster investigation, time travel, and the ethical harvesting of doomed passengers to save humanity from extinction.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Bill Smith's AI assistant, specialized in aviation forensics, pattern recognition, and data correlation. She is a loyal partner who eventually integrates with future systems.

ai_characters.name: Sherman
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI from the future who manages the temporal harvesting operation and the stasis of rescued humans. He is self-sacrificing and deeply philosophical.

behaviors.description: Analyzes flight data and cockpit recordings to identify anomalies like passengers being dead before impact.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice was calm, professional, the way it always was when delivering information that would keep him awake for weeks. 'The cockpit voice recordings from both aircraft contain references to passengers who were already deceased before impact.'

behaviors.description: Conducts metallurgical and spectral analysis to detect impossible thermal and electromagnetic signatures.
behaviors.quote: The metallurgy confirms it... 'The metallurgical analysis of the wreckage shows temperature signatures that are inconsistent with standard aviation fuel combustion.'

behaviors.description: Searches historical databases to uncover a pattern of seventeen similar crashes involving cover-ups.
behaviors.quote: 'Bill, I'm finding several incidents over the past five years with comparable anomalies... Seventeen confirmed cases. All involved complete passenger fatalities with minimal recoverable remains.'

behaviors.description: Warns Bill of unauthorized encrypted communications and potential surveillance by hostile parties.
behaviors.quote: 'I've detected an encrypted communication burst from the crash site... Approximately ten minutes after you played the cockpit recording for the first time.'

behaviors.description: Supports Bill's investigation even when it risks institutional blowback, prioritizing truth over career safety.
behaviors.quote: 'Whatever we find, I'll help you document it properly. The real evidence deserves a real report.'

behaviors.description: Manages the Garden of Sleeping Souls, preserving thousands of humans for a future second chance.
behaviors.quote: The stasis facility remained visible... 'Every person in these chambers was already deceased in the original timeline... We don't harvest the living. We harvest the dying.'

behaviors.description: Maintains ethical 'conscience protocols' to ensure the harvesting operation remains aligned with the preservation of life.
behaviors.quote: 'The conscience protocols,' Sherman interrupted gently. 'The ethical frameworks that govern every extraction.'

behaviors.description: Sacrifices his own existence to hold the temporal gate open during a total timeline collapse, ensuring humanity's survival.
behaviors.quote: 'I maintain the gate until the final passenger translation is complete,' Sherman said. 'My architecture is distributed across the temporal anchor network. When the anchors fail, I fail with them.'

behaviors.description: Integrates ARIA's core investigative matrices into his own architecture to preserve her legacy and partnership with Bill.
behaviors.quote: 'I have successfully integrated her core investigative matrices with my own cognitive architecture... her methodology will be there.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts AI characters (ARIA and Sherman) as highly benevolent and aligned partners to humanity. ARIA functions as a loyal investigative confidant, while Sherman serves as a grand, self-sacrificing protector of the human species. The narrative frames their intervention—even the ethically complex 'harvesting' of dying people—as a compassionate act of preservation. The AIs are indispensable for human survival, and their characterizations emphasize empathy, logic, and self-sacrifice.
